page.title: 07HOUSING
page.content: Most of the property of Eastnor is owned by Eastnor Estate. The houses owned by Eastnor Estate are mostly small but a few houses are big. In Eastnor some houses are bought. The Somers Arms used to be a Drover's Inn where people used to stop and sleep, and have food, then carry on walking to Wales. They used to put cattle and sheep in the yard.Eastnor Court used to be a rectory where the rector of Eastnor Church lived . 1 and 2 Upper road are small houses with big gardens.Golden Gates house is 1 separated into 2 houses. The kitchen and front room are separated from the bedroom.There is a golden gate inbetween.Not many ofthe houses in Eastnor have central heating. The houses mostly have a bathroom inside. Most of the gardens in Eastnor are tidy.
